title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 203-6.1 - Metering and Regulating
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 203-6.1 - Metering and Regulating

State Regulations
(a) Applicability: The requirements of this section apply to all metering and
regulating components at the City Gate. (b) Metering and regulating components are
subject to the LDAR requirements in Subpart 2037. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
203-6.1

Adopted

New

York State Register February 16, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 07, eff. 3/3/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
